alert.note: Alert for Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 12 at 3:46AM CST until December 15 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow and mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Holt County. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on very slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heavy snow will be preceded by rain and a wintry mix, which may lead to a layer of ice underneath.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
